channel.title: ML on 张 瀚 铎 Zhang Handuo
channel.description: Recent content in ML on 张 瀚 铎 Zhang Handuo

item.title: Pooling Layer in CNN (1)
item.description: Today I didn’t have the mood to continue my work on map merging of different cameras. So I read the paper from DeepMind of Learned Deformation Stability in Convolutional Neural Networks recommended by Wang Chen. 1. Convolution Operation Convolution operation is typically denoted with an asterisk1: $$ s(t)=(x*w)(t) $$ In Convolutional network terminology, the x is referred to as the input, and the w as the kernel. The output is sometimes referred to as the feature map.
